data.title: Atlanta Hawks Roster, Schedule, Stats (2002-2003)
data.meta_description: 2002-2003: Atlanta Hawks roster and stats. Quick access to players bio, career stats and team records.
data.text:
2002-2003 - Points

Glenn Robinson scores a season high 37 points for Atlanta Hawks

On November 11, 2002, Glenn Robinson set a season high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 37 points in Atlanta Hawks's home win against Seattle Sonics, 119-116. He also had 12 rebounds, 5 assists, 3 steals and finished the game with a 42 efficiency.

2002-2003 - Rebounds

Alan Henderson grabs a season high 21 rebounds for Atlanta Hawks

On November 11, 2002, Alan Henderson set a season high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 21 rebounds in Atlanta Hawks's home win against Seattle Sonics, 119-116. He also had 14 points, 1 assist and finished the game with a 27 efficiency.

2002-2003 - Assists

Jason Terry dishes a season high 16 assists for Atlanta Hawks

On March 03, 2003, Jason Terry set a season high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 16 assists in Atlanta Hawks's home loss against Los Angeles Lakers, 91-108. He also had 10 points, 6 rebounds and finished the game with a 16 efficiency.

2002-2003 - Steals

Shareef Abdur-Rahim has a season high 6 steals for Atlanta Hawks

On January 01, 2003, Shareef Abdur-Rahim set a season high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 6 steals in Atlanta Hawks's home loss against Detroit Pistons, 86-90. He also had 20 points, 10 rebounds, 6 steals and finished the game with a 22 efficiency.

2002-2003 - Blocks

Theo Ratliff blocks a season high 9 blocks for Atlanta Hawks Theo Ratliff

On February 02, 2003, Theo Ratliff set a season high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 9 blocks in Atlanta Hawks's home win against Orlando Magic, 97-89. He also had 9 points, 9 rebounds and finished the game with a 23 efficiency.

2002-2003 - Efficiency

Glenn Robinson set a season high 42 efficiency for Atlanta Hawks

On November 11, 2002, Glenn Robinson set a season high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 42 efficiency in Atlanta Hawks's home win against Seattle Sonics, 119-116. He also had 37 points, 12 rebounds, 3 steals and finished the game with a 42 efficiency.
